Desc.entry: Delivers personal training and fun group fitness camps throughout Sheffield and Chatsworth in the Peak district. All sessions can be carried out in your own home, our private studio or gym and in the great outdoors. Offers a wide range of group sessions for all ages from children to adults. Run regular children's sessions at Abbeydale Tennis Club which are designed to energise, invigorate and help children enjoy regular group exercise. Also offers children's sessions in schools throughout Sheffield and North Derbyshire and have weekly fitness camps running in Sheffield and Chatsworth Park. Sessions are very welcoming and designed for all abilities. Offers free taster sessions.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Sat 5-6pm, Sat 8.15-9am (children's sessions), Mon & Fri 12noon-1pm (fitness camp)

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon & Wed 9.30-10.30am, Mon, Wed & Fri 6.30-7.30pm, Sat 8.30-9.30am (fitness camp, Chatsworth), personal training (Totley, Chatsworth or in-home) at a time to suit you
